transcript:
Customer: Hello

Customer: Hello
Executive: Yes, Bhumika from IndiaMART.
Customer: Oh, abhi theek hai mam, voice aa rahi hai proper. Abhi aa rahi hai, aa rahi hai proper.
Executive: Theek hai, theek hai. Dekhiye mam, mere paas na aapke do plans chal rahe hain. One is export and one is domestic. Right.
Customer: Right.
Executive: Aapke jo export mein aapko balance milta hai, usme 10 leads aapko milti hain. Daily bonus ka usme kuch bhi nahi hai. Theek hai?
Customer: Export mein?
Executive: Export mein 10 leads milti hain aapko weekly. Theek hai? IndiaMART jo aapko leads provide karta hai mam, wo weekly milti hain. You can say Saturday ki night ko 11:59 pe 11:59 PM, okay? Aapki leads lapse ho jati hain. And after one minute jab aapki date change ho jati hai, jab Sunday ho jata hai. Saturday ki night ko 11:59 ke baad 12:00 AM pe jab Sunday ho jata hai, to aapko do ek minute ke baad hi dusre week ki lead allocate ho jati hai.
Customer: Okay.
Executive: Is tarike se ye process work karta hai. Agar ye to seedha seedha export mein simple hai ki aapko 10 leads weekly milti hain. Aapko Sunday to Saturday apna use karna hai. Agar aap use karte hain to by lead balance khatam ho jayega. Agar aap nahi karte hain to wo aapka matlab carry forward nahi hoti hai, lapse ho jati hain.
Customer: Okay, every week. Theek hai. This is for export, right?
Executive: This is for export, correct. Leads ka sab tarike se mam har weekly hi milti hain. Wo Sunday to Saturday hi rehta hai aapka. Lead lapse har week hoti hai aapki. Theek hai?
Customer: Ab hum India pe aa jate hain. India mein mam aap export export mein mujhe ek doubt hai. Usi ke exact niche non lapsable age likha hai, to wo kya hai?
Executive: Yes, main usi pe aane wali thi. Dekhiye mam, jaise let suppose aapne apni weekly 10 lead use kar li, man lijiye Friday tak ya man lijiye Thursday tak. Theek hai? Ab aapko ek aur lead use karni hai. To agar aapke paas non lapsable lead nahi hai, to you need to pay something to IndiaMART ek by lead purchase.
Customer: Hmm, hmm. Theek hai. But jab aapne ye plan liya tha to usme additional humne aapko kuch non lapsable lead provide kari thi. That was I believe 40 something. To wo non lapsable leads aapko allocate hui thi. To wo abhi aapki eight hi bachi hain. Only eight. Matlab man lijiye abhi aapki weekly lead nine bachi hai and today is Thursday. Theek hai? Aap man lijiye ye nine ki nine lead aapne aaj hi use kar li. Theek hai? Jab aap 10th lead uthane jaoge to aapka wo non lapsable mein se deduct hoga. Matlab wo eight ka seven ho jayega.
Customer: Ah, ah, ah, ah, ah, ah, ah, ah, ah, ah, ah, ah, ah, ah, ah, ah, ah, ah, ah, ah, ah, ah, ah, ah, ah, ah, ah, ah, ah, ah, ah, ah, ah, ah, ah, ah, ah, ah, ah, ah, ah, ah, ah, ah, ah, ah, ah, ah, ah, ah, ah, ah, ah, ah, ah, ah, ah, ah, ah, ah, ah, ah, ah, ah, ah, ah, ah, ah, ah, ah, ah, ah, ah, ah, ah, ah, ah, ah, ah, ah, ah, ah, ah, ah, ah, ah, ah, ah, ah, ah, ah, ah, ah, ah, ah, ah, ah, ah, ah, ah, ah, ah, ah, ah, ah, ah, ah, ah, ah, ah, ah, ah, ah, ah, ah, ah, ah, ah, ah, ah, ah, ah, ah, ah, ah, ah, ah, ah
Executive: Ye lapse nahi hoti hai weekly.
Customer: Ye aapke pure yearly plan ke sath milti hai. Jab tak plan hai tab tak rahegi.
Executive: Theek hai, chalega. Okay. Theek hai? Ye non lapsable aapko India mein ye jo yearly likha hua aa raha hai na, ye bhi pehle thi lekin ye ab sari use ho chuki hai. India wali isliye wo zero balance dikha raha hai.
Customer: Theek hai, chalega.
Executive: India balance mein yearly zero dikha raha hai. Ab agar hum India pe aa jate hain, aapko daily bonus pe do lead weekly milti hain. Theek hai? Aur weekly aapko 20 leads milti hai mam.
Customer: Ab iska matlab ye hua?
Executive: Main, ha, isi ka difference ye hua. Jaise mam har din ki do do lead aapko minimum purchase karni hi hai. Agar aap nahi karenge to wo har din ke raat ke 12 baje matlab lapse ho jayegi. Aaj Thursday hai, aaj aapko do lead mili. Aapne ek use kar li hai, ek bachi hui hai. Theek hai? Agar aap ye use kar lete hain to ye zero by two ho jayega. Agar aap nahi karte hain to that would be lapse today night.
Customer: Okay, theek hai.
Executive: Theek hai na? To ye aaj raat ko 12 baje lapse ho jayegi agar aapne use nahi ki.

Customer: Aapka aawaz fir se chala gaya hai Bhumika.





Customer: I can't hear you Bhumika.



Executive: Aap jis vyakti se baat kar rahe hain, unhone aapke call ko hold par rakha hai.
summary:
Concerns:

- Wants to understand lead allocation for export and domestic.

- Wants to know about non-lapsable leads.



Resolution:

- Explained weekly lead allocation for export plan.

- Explained non-lapsable leads and their usage.

- Explained daily bonus leads and weekly leads for India.



Next Steps: 

None

Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Satisfied



@@@Key Topics:

- buyleads, export, domestic, non-lapsable leads
